name: BenB-R's Command-Line Dungeon Crawler
description:
How to play:

To get the game running first load a map: 

load simple.map or load advanced.map or load simple2.map.

to enter advanced mode type advanced. (advanced mode the monsters will move and attack you, they will also grow stronger if they collect a coin).

to start the game type play.

to move use W, A, S and D, 

Press the spacebar to attack monsters and press P to pick up coins

The Player is Marked with @, walls with #, Monsters with M, Coins with C and the finish with X.

This was an assessed piece of coursework and was created from a base including the level maps.

The Dungeon crawler was completed with all required, advanced and extra functionality. This can be seen in the screenshots.
